pageProduct.name: Root Touch Up Colour Blending Gel 5R Auburn Red
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Introducing Clairol Root Touch-Up Semi-Permanent Colour Blending Gel. Refresh your roots in just 10 minutes - without damaging your hair. This easy-to-use, no-mix gel formula comes ready to apply with its built-in applicator brush. Each application of the reusable formula conceals greys for up to 10+ washes. It's ammonia-free, peroxide-free, and worry-free hair colour. Apply to your temples, roots, and hairline to extend the life of your colour in minutes. Just brush, rinse, and go!

Boxed Contents: 1. Colour blending gel
2. Instruction Leaflet
3. Two pairs of Gloves

Size: 45ml

KEY FEATURES

• The first 10-wash, risk-free way to mask greys
• Semi-permanent
• Peroxide & ammonia free formula
• Simple, no mixing, no mess, no fuss, application
• Damage free formula
• Leaves hair soft and shiny

Ingredients

Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Undeceth-3, Ethanolamine, Oleic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycol Distearate, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Resorcinol, Parfum/Fragrance, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, p-Aminophenol, 2-Chloro-6-Ethylamino-4-Nitrophenol, HC Red No. 3, 2-Amino-6-Chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Ascorbic Acid, Disodium EDTA, m-Aminophenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Heavy Metals, Limonene.

Contains: Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Undeceth-3, Ethanolamine, Oleic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycol Distearate, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Resorcinol, Parfum/Fragrance, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, p-Aminophenol, 2-Chloro-6-Ethylamino-4-Nitrophenol, HC Red No. 3, 2-Amino-6-Chloro-4-Nitrophenol, Ascorbic Acid, Disodium EDTA, m-Aminophenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Heavy Metals, Limonene.

Directions

1. Prep
- Use an old towel to protect your clothing and household surfaces. If product gets on skin or household surface, wipe away immediately to avoid staining.
- Brush dry hair into your preferred style
- Put on gloves.

2. Apply
- Remove cap and hold tube with brush tip facing down.
- Squeeze tube until you see gel appear on brush
- Brush onto greys at part line, face frame or temples
- Be sure to saturate your most visible greys with the colour gel

3. Finish
- Once you're done applying, leave product on hair for 10 minutes.
- When time is up, rinse gel from hair.
- Condition as needed
